en: New security protocols today. We've received intelligence about [color=YELLOW]suspicious activities[/color].
All travelers must undergo enhanced inspection procedures.
Watch for [color=YELLOW]nervous behavior, unusual mannerisms, or reluctance to make eye contact[/color].
All suspicious items must be confiscated and logged. For Spud's security, of course.
We're especially concerned about [color=CRIMSON]forbidden materials[/color] - anti-government literature, photography equipment...
Their voice drops ominously. "[pulse freq=2][color=DARK_VIOLET]We have special procedures for those individuals.[/color][/pulse]"
[wave amp=15 freq=2][color=DARK_VIOLET]Root Reserve[/color][/wave] trucks unload crates marked "Premium Reserve" into the cafeteria. The smell is enticing, but your stomach turns.
Have you tried the new Premium Reserve? My cousin disappeared last month. Failed inspection.
Maybe he's part of this batch, huh? [tornado radius=2 freq=2][color=STEEL_BLUE]Dark humor, you know?[/color][/tornado]
You're right. Sometimes joking is easier than thinking about [pulse freq=3][color=CRIMSON]what might actually be happening[/color][/pulse].
The officer watches you leave. "Hey, I get it. Lost my appetite too..."
Convenient timing for new security protocols, isn't it? [wave amp=15 freq=3][color=YELLOW]They're trying to stop information about Root Reserve.[/color][/wave]
I have something that might help us. Some potatoes with [color=CHARTREUSE]vital information deserve to get through[/color].
You consider your options carefully. Today's choices could help [color=CHARTREUSE]spread truth[/color]... or [color=CRIMSON]silence it forever[/color].
